snippet: Members of Alibaba’s management team are scheduled to hold a series of informal meetings with investors in several American cities, according to people briefed on the matter.
abstract: Members of Alibaba’s management team are scheduled to hold a series of informal meetings with investors in several American cities, according to people briefed on the matter.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Alibaba Drops In to Say Hi to Institutional Investors in U.S.
